actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy

official_title: Directing the Secretary of the Treasury to produce all factual information pertaining to the actions taken by the Secretary of the Treasury and the United States Executive Directors at the international financial institutions to comply with the requirements of 1621 of the International Financial Institutions Act, relating to encouragement of fair labor practices.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to produce all factual information concerning actions the Secretary and the United States Executive Directors at international financial institutions have taken to comply with specified requirements of the International Financial Institutions Act regarding encouragement of borrowing countries to implement fair labor practices.

titles.title: Directing the Secretary of the Treasury to produce all factual information pertaining to the actions taken by the Secretary of the Treasury and the United States Executive Directors at the international financial institutions to comply with the requirements of 1621 of the International Financial Institutions Act, relating to encouragement of fair labor practices.
